name: EmpyrionManagementSuite
tagline: A simple, yet robust management tool for Empyrion: Galactic Survival.
body:
## Introducing EMS!
Empyrion Management Suite is a simple, yet robust management tool for Empyrion Galactic Survival. It has an intuitive user interface that will allow you to create, manage, modify, and export custom sectors, playfields, and configurations! These configurations can be published to your single player games, or you can choose to deploy all of the necessary server files necessary to run a dedicated server with SteamCMD. It's really easy and fast to get started. Download the latest stable version by clicking the button above!

### Latest Stable Release [Angry Anteater] v1.0.1
**TBA - not yet released.**

### Open Source & How To Contribute
EMS is licensed under MIT. You are free to fork and modify or redistribute this source code in any way, as long as you credit this original project and keep it Open Source. If you are looking to help and contribute to the project in some way, please visit the [THIS THREAD](http://empyriononline.com/forums/the-hangar-bay.29/) on the Official Empyrion Forums for more info about the project roadmap.

### Developers and Contributors
**MorpheusZero** (@MorpheusZero) - _Lead Developer & Project Manager_

### Support or Contact
If you are looking for support or need to get in contact with members of our team, please submit an issue report on the [Issue Tracker](https://github.com/MorpheusZero/EmpyrionManagementSuite/issues) page.
